p: Sage ( Salvia officinalis L.) from family Lamiaceae is aromatic plant used in traditional medicine for treating many ailments as inflammation of mouth and throat ( Baricevic et al., 2001) and used as antimutagenic and anticarcenogenic agent ( Craig, 1999, Simic et al., 2000). It is also employed as diuretic, tonic, local styptic, antiseptic, antifungal and spasmodic pain relief ( Loannides, 2002).
